name: Bumper Cars
description:
Destroy enemy cars by crashing into them in this bouncy, demolition derby-like game!

---------------------------------------------

In bumper cars, you control a lone orange car, pitted against 3 others in a a fight to the death in a very bouncy rink, surrounded by the fierce sandstorms of the desert. Will the enemy cars come out on top, or will you be able to return home for dinner?

---------------------------------------------
